handle

public Response handle(Request request)
Description copied from class: Mapper
Process a REST Request. In subclasses this method will typically delegate to the handle method of downstream Mapper objects (eg. RouteMapper), or will actually handle the resource Request and generate a Response object (eg. QueryMapper)

Specified by:
handle in class Mapper
Parameters:
request - the REST request to process
Returns:
the REST response
